name: Invio
short_description: Self-hosted invoicing without the bloat. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Self-hosted invoicing without the bloat. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Invio is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, utility, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Invio on your home server to self-hosted invoicing without the bloat. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Invio to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
